short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add charm and whimsy to your new tab with the Anime Girl and Kuromi Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This delightful design features an adorable anime girl alongside the playful Kuromi, creating a unique and heartwarming scene. Access favorite sites with ease, personalize with custom shortcuts, and stay organized with the built-in calendar and clock. Enjoy effortless browsing using your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Adorable anime girl and Kuromi in a lively and captivating design.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly navigate to your favorite websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with frequently used links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of your schedule with an integrated clock and calendar.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Seamless web browsing with your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall quickly via the provided links.
